sentences.sContent: The palace is full of priceless antiques.
sentences.sCn: 宫殿里到处都是价值连城的古董。

sentences.sContent: They bought the clock at an antique shop in Bath.
sentences.sCn: 他们在巴斯一家古玩店里买了这只钟。

synos.tran: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，[古]古董的；古风的，古式的
[古]古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格

phrases.pCn: 古董家具；古典家具；古式家具

remMethod.val: anti(=ante， 前) ＋ que → 以前的 → 古时的

trans.tranOther: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable
